reviews.review_text: This cafe is super cute and aesthetic! The food is delicious, though the service could use some improvement. During peak days, the waiting time can be up to an hour. However, the beautiful view and attention to aesthetic details, whether it's the toothpick, menu, or bill—make it worth the visit. Everything is so pretty, you’ll end up taking lots of pictures when you go there!

I recently had the pleasure of dining at here, and I must say, it was a truly exceptional experience. From the moment I stepped inside, I was struck by the warm and inviting ambiance. The décor was tasteful and elegant, with soft lighting and comfortable seating that immediately made me feel at ease.

But what really impressed me was the food. I ordered the garlic bread and chicken burger, and it was cooked to perfection. The flavors were rich and complex, with each bite a masterful balance of textures and tastes. The portion size was generous, and I left feeling satisfied but not stuffed.

The service was also top-notch. Our server was friendly and attentive, knowledgeable about the menu and happy to make recommendations. The staff were efficient and courteous, ensuring that our dining experience was seamless and enjoyable.

Overall, I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a great dining experience. The combination of excellent food, comfortable ambiance, and top-notch service makes it a standout in the city's culinary scene.

Had a fantastic brunch at this cozy, beach-facing cafe! The food was absolutely delicious, with fresh ingredients and generous portions. The pesto pasta was out of the world!!!!. The atmosphere is perfect for a relaxing meal by the ocean, and the view adds a wonderful touch. The staff were friendly and attentive, making our experience even better. Highly recommend this spot for anyone looking to enjoy great food with a beautiful beach vibe!
